entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to flurries this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
